message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high worth to you, valued at $12,000, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
